title: they should do april fools star guardians
body:
like make it nothing but the ugly champs to be star guardians, ex:

{{champion:223}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:48}} all in the girl star guardian uniform.

what would you guys think of that for april fools?

replies.body: I'm too invested in the Star Guardian lore to approve of this idea.
I would hate it. And I say that as someone who plays all these 5 champions you mentioned here. I would _absolutely_ hate it.
Just No! SG skinline one of the biggest skinline also all SG skins connected lorewise so doing this will make it lose its value of being long waited special skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Farih Fynrux,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6MWdaE97,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-25T23:14:48.360+0000)
>
> Just No! SG skinline one of the biggest skinline also all SG skins connected lorewise so doing this will make it lose its value of being long waited special skins.

ehhhh Star Guardian's run its course imo
